float getMedianUnmanaged ( float  arr[],
int  n 
)

Returns median of the array. Changes array!

Parameters:
arr the array n length of array

This Quickselect routine is based on the algorithm described in "Numerical recipes in C", Second Edition, Cambridge University Press, 1992, Section 8.5, ISBN 0-521-43108-5 This code by Nicolas Devillard - 1998. Public domain.
